statements.statement:
SELECT NVL(sum(de.sales_amt), 0) sales_amount FROM tb_cement_sales_master ma, tb_cement_sales_detail de WHERE ma.company_cd = de.company_cd AND ma.dept_cd = de.dept_cd AND ma.sales_date = de.sales_date AND ma.sales_no = de.sales_no AND ma.company_cd = 'GA00' AND ma.customer_cd = ${customerCd} AND ma.status = '0' {#1}
AND ma.sales_no != ${salesNo}
